error_calc_empty: ⚠️ Can't find what needs to be calculated. Use /help_calc for help.
calculator_desc_calc: Performs quick arithmetic — add, subtract, multiply, divide, use percentages, and continue from previous results.
calculator_tags_calc: calculator, math, arithmetic, calc, calculation, percent
calculator_help_calc: 📟 Quick Calculator /calc Performs instant arithmetic operations. Simplified version of /math with focus on speed and clarity. ✅ Features: • Basic arithmetic (+, -, *, /, %) • Parentheses and order of operations • Real-time evaluation and formatting • Accepts single-line or multi-expression input • Easy percents calculated • Support for comments at the end.
calculator_examples_calc: Basic math: • /calc 5 + 3 * 2 simple comment • /calc (10 - 4) / 3 Percentages and combined expressions: • /calc (200 + 10%) - 5% Numbers formats: • /calc -3.5k + 7,000.5 • /calc 4,2 * .2 - 1 Support multi-line mode (or split by ';'): • /calc (100k - 4%) / 3 👆 price; - 10% our commission
